sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
h1 123
form
  hr
  section(v-for="quest in quests")
    quest-radio(@submit="setUserAnswer" :quest="quest")
  button.btn.btn-primary.mb-2(type='submit' @click="submit") Пров

  //- h2 {{ scores }}
  hr
  h1 {{ finalScores }}
</template>

<script>
import "@ssthouse/vue3-tree-chart/dist/vue3-tree-chart.css";
import QuestRadio from "@/components/QuestRadio.vue";
import { loadQuests } from "@/api.js";

export default {
  components: { QuestRadio },
  data() {
    return {
      quests: [],
      userAnsewers: {},
      scores: 0,
      finalScores: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    // score() {
    //   return this.userAnsewers.filter(function (val) {
    //     return val;
    //   }).length;
    // },
    setUserAnswer(answer, currentQuest, index) {
      // console.log("okoko");
      // console.log(answer);
      console.log(index);
      // this.userAnswers[index] = true;
      // console.log("okoko");
      // console.log(this.userAnsewers);
      if (answer) this.scores++;
      else if (!answer && currentQuest) this.scores--;
      // else if (!currentQuest) this.scores--;
    },
    submit() {
      this.finalScores = this.scores;
      this.$emit("Submit", this.finalScores);
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.quests = loadQuests();
    // this.userAnsewers = Array(this.quests.length).fill(false);
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped lang="stylus">
input
  display: block
span
  text-align: left
</style>
